'''The Walt Disney Company''', commonly referred to as simply '''Disney''', is an American entertainment and film company that was founded on October 16th, 1923 by {{Wikipedia|Walt Disney|Walt}} and {{Wikipedia|Roy Disney}}. Some of their biggest studios include [[w:Walt Disney_Pictures|Walt Disney Pictures]], [[w:Pixar|Pixar]], [[w:Marvel Studios|Marvel Studios]], [[w:Lucasfilm|Lucasfilm]], and more.

Disney and their studios have partnered with [[Mojang Studios|Mojang]] multiple times in ''Minecraft'', with notable works including packs in the [[Legacy Console Edition|Legacy Console]] and ''[[Bedrock Edition|Bedrock]]'' editions such as the [[Skin pack|Star Wars skin packs]], the [[Disney Worlds of Adventure]] world, and more.

=== Inside Out ===
Releasing in 2015, ''{{Wikipedia|Inside Out (2015 film)|Inside Out}}'' is an animated film exploring the emotions of a young girl named [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Riley_Andersen Riley]. Her initial emotions included [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Joy Joy], [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Sadness Sadness], [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Anger Anger], [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Disgust Disgust], and [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Fear Fear], who throughout the film attempt to help Riley adjust to living in a new city. In 2024, the film received a {{Wikipedia|Inside Out 2|sequel}}, which introduced several new pubertal emotions. These include [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Anxiety Anxiety], [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Envy Envy], [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Embarrassment Embarrassment], [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Ennui Ennui], and [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Nostalgia Nostalgia].

=== Mickey Mouse & Friends ===
{{Hatnote|"Donald Duck" and "Daisy Duck" redirect here. For other uses, see [[Duck]].}}
[[File:Mickey Mouse Original.png|thumb|200px|An early rendition of Mickey's design.]]
First appearing in ''{{Wikipedia|Steamboat Willie}}'', {{Wikipedia|Mickey Mouse}} is a cartoon character created by Walt Disney and {{Wikipedia|Ub Iwerks}}, serving as a mascot for the company. Throughout his adventures Mickey has filled many roles, including a trickster, an everyman, a sorcerer's apprentice, and a full time hero, making many friends across the years. His first and closest companion is {{Wikipedia|Minnie Mouse}}, often serving as his love interest or partner in crime. Most frequently, Mickey is part of a trio with {{Wikipedia|Donald Duck}} and {{Wikipedia|Goofy}}, two characters known for their bombastic personalities. Other recurring characters include his pet {{Wikipedia|Pluto (Disney)|Pluto}}, his archenemy {{Wikipedia|Pete (Disney)|Peg Leg Pete}}, and the mischievous chipmunk brothers {{Wikipedia|Chip 'n' Dale}}.

== Education releases ==

=== Build Your Joy ===
{{Main|Build Your Joy}}
To promote the release of Inside Out 2, a 50-minute lesson was released on [[Minecraft Education]] entitled Build Your Joy. The map features Joy and Anxiety, attempting to solve a puzzle.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://education.minecraft.net/en-us/challenges/build-your-joy|title=Build Your Joy|author=Minecraft Education|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240614072115/https://education.minecraft.net/en-us/challenges/build-your-joy}}</ref> At an unknown time, it was delisted.
